title: Database of Epidemiological Parameters
text: epiparameterDB provides database epidemiological parameters. stores data epiparameter R package. recommend reading epidemiological parameters via epiparameter::epiparameter_db() function rather using package. epiparameter::epiparameter_db() function formats epidemiological parameters <epiparameter> objects organises object elements (e.g. R classes like <distribution> <bibentry>), whereas reading parameter database (parameters.json) package provide list information. epiparameterDB developed Centre Mathematical Modelling Infectious Diseases London School Hygiene Tropical Medicine part Epiverse-TRACE.
